title: Wednesday Post Show (03-16-22)
itunes:title: Wednesday Post Show (03-16-22)
description:
Bobby starts with the Top 3 songs in country music. Bobby talks about how Apple's HQ being evacuated after white powder found reminded him of a funny story about Eddie. We also talk about a woman who had a tumbler in her body for years and the effects of ‘treat brain’. We also talk about why Amy is trying to help the orphanage in Haiti where her kids grew up.

Help Us Celebrate Amy's Birthday By Purchasing #PIMPINJOY - HERE

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
